casebody.data:
INTERNATIONAL PROPERTY DEVELOPMENTS, LLC d/b/a Signature Group, Plaintiff,
v.
K CONSTRUCTION & ROOFING, LLC, Evangel Worship Center, Inc., and Bank of the Ozarks as successor-in-interest to Bank of the Carolinas, Defendants. No. COA17-509 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 20, 2018

DISMISSED IN PART; AFFIRMED IN PART.
